xmlquery.searchDevice: Select *, b.nmDeviceType as nmDeviceType from smiot_device a inner join smiot_device_type b inner join smhris_site c on a.idDeviceType = b.idDeviceType and a.idSite = c.idSite order by a.updatedTime desc
xmlquery.searchDeviceByIdSite: Select *, b.nmDeviceType as nmDeviceType from smiot_device a inner join smiot_device_type b inner join smhris_site c on a.idDeviceType = b.idDeviceType and a.idSite = c.idSite where idSite = ? order by a.updatedTime desc
xmlquery.searchDeviceTrx: Select * from smiot_devicetrx where idSite = ? order by updatedTime desc
xmlquery.searchDeviceById: Select *, b.nmDeviceType as nmDeviceType from smiot_device a inner join smiot_device_type b inner join smhris_site c on a.idDeviceType = b.idDeviceType and a.idSite = c.idSite where a.idDevice = ?
xmlquery.searchDeviceByAnyLike: Select *, b.nmDeviceType as nmDeviceType from smiot_device a inner join smiot_device_type b inner join smhris_site c on a.idDeviceType = b.idDeviceType and a.idSite = c.idSite where a.idDevice like ? or a.idDeviceType like ? or a.idSite like ?
xmlquery.deviceEdit: Update smiot_device set idSite=?, idDevice=?, idDeviceType=? where idDevice=?
